title: The Herald of Blaugust 2025
description: Blaugust is coming!  Have you heard the word? It is back again for another year.  Blaugust 2025 is nearly here! This year there are some small changes.  Life has been hitting Belghast pretty hard this year, so Krikket of Nerd Girl Thoughts has picked up the torch to coordinate the event.  The event is, otherwise, […]
author: Wilhelm Arcturus
excerpt: Blaugust is coming! Have you heard the word? It is back again for another year. Blaugust 2025 is nearly here! This year there are some small changes. Life has been hitting Belghast pretty hard t…
text: Blaugust is coming!  Have you heard the word? It is back again for another year.  Blaugust 2025 is nearly here! Blaugust 2025 This year there are some small changes.  Life has been hitting Belghast pretty hard this year, so Krikket of Nerd Girl Thoughts has picked up the torch to coordinate the event.  The event is, otherwise, as you expect, with some of us helping out more so than usual to give Bel the space he needs without him feeling he is letting anybody down.  He is not letting us down.  We’ve got this.  We can keep this going when he needs some time. We ought to be able to manage, we’ve only seen it done nearly a dozen times already, right? Okay, enough of the preamble, here is what you need to know to join in on the event: Blaugust initial Announcement – All this info in a longer format Blaugust Sign-Up Page – Get yourself officially on the Blaugust list Blaugust Discord Server – Come hang out with fellow Blaugust participants Blaugust Mastodon Account – The official social media organ of Blaugust Blaugust Blue Sky Account – Mirrored from Mastodon Blaugust Blue Sky Feed –For those of us trying to recreate the Twitter good times The Blaugust Prompt List – The 2024 version, but they’re still fresh Blaugust Media Kit page – Where to find all the Blaugust logos For social media the tag is #Blaugust2025. The event is broken up into weeks… though the calendar is being unhelpful this year, with August being spread over six weeks total, so we’re doing a sort of Thursday to Wednesday week break this time around… which is probably good, as it puts the weekend in the middle of each week, and some of us do a lot of our writing on those days.  So the weeks will be laid out like: Welcome to Blaugust Week (August 1st – August 6th) – The idea behind this week is to give a specific time to be actively talking about Blaugust and welcoming new members to the fold. This could also count as promoting Blaugust for the “Spreading the Madness” achievement. The hope is that drumming up some heavy activity of talking about the event might allow us to pick up a few more stragglers. Introduce Yourself Week (August 7th – August 13th) – The idea behind this week is to have some structured time around getting to know the other bloggers. I realize that those of us who are veteran bloggers might have already written half a dozen introduction posts by now, but it is a great time to share anything interesting you might have in your arsenal. Creator Appreciation Week (August 14th – August 20th) – Developer Appreciation Week or the D.A.W. was an event that took place in the blogging community independent from Blaugust but eventually died out. The more modern idea is to show appreciation for the things and creators that we love. This could be authors, musicians, developers, artists, or even other bloggers, with the focus being on sharing something that we love so that maybe others might appreciate it as well. Staying Motivated Week (August 21st – August 27th) – As we get towards the end of the event, the activity can often trail off a bit. The goal of this week is to share some of your own tips surrounding how you keep motivated and stay focused on creating content. If you are new to the event, you might share some of the things that have helped you stay engaged during Blaugust. Lessons Learned Week (August 28th – August 31st) – This week is a reminder that the goal of Blaugust is to refresh the content creators out there for the coming year, and not to burn them out in the process. Some folks are going to cross the finish line and immediately go dormant and others will want to process their thoughts about the proceedings. This space is reserved as a bit of a cool down lap so that you can share your own experiences. That last week isn’t a full week, I know… but I’ve been on the internet long enough to bemoan the fact that most people are content to learn nothing and carry on, so maybe we don’t need seven days for that.  Do we ever learn? For those of you who like a nice calendar graphic… well, you’re out of luck because I did the graphic this year, so you’re stuck with this. Blaugust Event Break Out It matches the logo… sort of… which I also did… all in Canva… which is why it looks so generic this year.  Maybe we can’t do everything Bel does. Some people have already been out spreading the word, and probably more Nerd Girl Thoughts – Blaugust 2025 is Coming! Tales of the Aggronaut – Blaugust in Another Castle Time to Loot – Blaugust 2025 is Coming! Inventory Full – Blaugust 2025: The Countdown Begins Contains Moderate Peril – Blaugust 2025 MOP – Blaugust 2025 is gearing up once again for the MMO blogging community Unidentified Signal Source – Shameless Plug Gaudete Theology – Blaugust is Coming…. Reay Jespersen – To Blaugust or not to Blaugust Lamezoid – Blaugust 2025 A Pixel Nomad – Blaugust? Blaugust – But Better with Friends And, finally, we have some people already signed up, with 52 blogs on the list so far.  These are in the order in which people signed up… so you can see I was the first one to test the form.  Next time around I’ll sort it alphabetically. TAGN Contains Moderate Peril The Dragon Chronicle Time to Loot Aywren’s Nook owlblog Juhis Pixel Nomad Axxuy.xyz Forking Mad Notes by JCProbably august morning Ubergeek Kellys World Words of the AgingGamer Geek on a Harley Inventory Full Indiecator Many Welps Chasing Dings! Casual Catte Creations Tales of the Aggronaut Nerd Girl Thoughts An Archaeopteryx Cubic Creativity Words Under My Name chaosgoat.neocities.org Gaudete Theology Exposition is Inevitable Monsterlady’s Diary Shadowz Abstract Gaming Mmo one night A Nerdy Fujo Cries The Ghastly Mirror Your friendly neighborhood Blu Lameazoid.com Unidentified Signal Source Taxodium Small Good Things Musings and Mumblings leekscosycorner Why I Game Mailvaltar Keeroks Space Reay Jespersen notes / druchan afsheen.me Calishat Nerdy Bookahs EVE Online Pictures Musings on seeking ねじまきブログ NickSimson.com So it is, off we go, another year, onward ho!
html:
Blaugust is coming!  Have you heard the word?

It is back again for another year.  Blaugust 2025 is nearly here!

Blaugust 2025

This year there are some small changes.  Life has been hitting Belghast pretty hard this year, so Krikket of Nerd Girl Thoughts has picked up the torch to coordinate the event.  The event is, otherwise, as you expect, with some of us helping out more so than usual to give Bel the space he needs without him feeling he is letting anybody down.  He is not letting us down.  We’ve got this.  We can keep this going when he needs some time.

We ought to be able to manage, we’ve only seen it done nearly a dozen times already, right?

Okay, enough of the preamble, here is what you need to know to join in on the event:

  • Blaugust initial Announcement – All this info in a longer format
  • Blaugust Sign-Up Page – Get yourself officially on the Blaugust list
  • Blaugust Discord Server – Come hang out with fellow Blaugust participants
  • Blaugust Mastodon Account – The official social media organ of Blaugust
  • Blaugust Blue Sky Account – Mirrored from Mastodon
  • Blaugust Blue Sky Feed –For those of us trying to recreate the Twitter good times
  • The Blaugust Prompt List – The 2024 version, but they’re still fresh
  • Blaugust Media Kit page – Where to find all the Blaugust logos

For social media the tag is #Blaugust2025.

The event is broken up into weeks… though the calendar is being unhelpful this year, with August being spread over six weeks total, so we’re doing a sort of Thursday to Wednesday week break this time around… which is probably good, as it puts the weekend in the middle of each week, and some of us do a lot of our writing on those days.  So the weeks will be laid out like:

  • Welcome to Blaugust Week (August 1st – August 6th) – The idea behind this week is to give a specific time to be actively talking about Blaugust and welcoming new members to the fold. This could also count as promoting Blaugust for the “Spreading the Madness” achievement. The hope is that drumming up some heavy activity of talking about the event might allow us to pick up a few more stragglers.
  • Introduce Yourself Week (August 7th – August 13th) – The idea behind this week is to have some structured time around getting to know the other bloggers. I realize that those of us who are veteran bloggers might have already written half a dozen introduction posts by now, but it is a great time to share anything interesting you might have in your arsenal.
  • Creator Appreciation Week (August 14th – August 20th) – Developer Appreciation Week or the D.A.W. was an event that took place in the blogging community independent from Blaugust but eventually died out. The more modern idea is to show appreciation for the things and creators that we love. This could be authors, musicians, developers, artists, or even other bloggers, with the focus being on sharing something that we love so that maybe others might appreciate it as well.
  • Staying Motivated Week (August 21st – August 27th) – As we get towards the end of the event, the activity can often trail off a bit. The goal of this week is to share some of your own tips surrounding how you keep motivated and stay focused on creating content. If you are new to the event, you might share some of the things that have helped you stay engaged during Blaugust.
  • Lessons Learned Week (August 28th – August 31st) – This week is a reminder that the goal of Blaugust is to refresh the content creators out there for the coming year, and not to burn them out in the process. Some folks are going to cross the finish line and immediately go dormant and others will want to process their thoughts about the proceedings. This space is reserved as a bit of a cool down lap so that you can share your own experiences.

That last week isn’t a full week, I know… but I’ve been on the internet long enough to bemoan the fact that most people are content to learn nothing and carry on, so maybe we don’t need seven days for that.  Do we ever learn?

For those of you who like a nice calendar graphic… well, you’re out of luck because I did the graphic this year, so you’re stuck with this.

Blaugust Event Break Out

It matches the logo… sort of… which I also did… all in Canva… which is why it looks so generic this year.  Maybe we can’t do everything Bel does.

Some people have already been out spreading the word, and probably more

  • Nerd Girl Thoughts – Blaugust 2025 is Coming!
  • Tales of the Aggronaut – Blaugust in Another Castle
  • Time to Loot – Blaugust 2025 is Coming!
  • Inventory Full – Blaugust 2025: The Countdown Begins
  • Contains Moderate Peril – Blaugust 2025
  • MOP – Blaugust 2025 is gearing up once again for the MMO blogging community
  • Unidentified Signal Source – Shameless Plug
  • Gaudete Theology – Blaugust is Coming….
  • Reay Jespersen – To Blaugust or not to Blaugust
  • Lamezoid – Blaugust 2025
  • A Pixel Nomad – Blaugust? Blaugust – But Better with Friends

And, finally, we have some people already signed up, with 52 blogs on the list so far.  These are in the order in which people signed up… so you can see I was the first one to test the form.  Next time around I’ll sort it alphabetically.

  1. TAGN
  2. Contains Moderate Peril
  3. The Dragon Chronicle
  4. Time to Loot
  5. Aywren’s Nook
  6. owlblog
  7. Juhis
  8. Pixel Nomad
  9. Axxuy.xyz
  10. Forking Mad
  11. Notes by JCProbably
  12. august morning
  13. Ubergeek Kellys World
  14. Words of the AgingGamer
  15. Geek on a Harley
  16. Inventory Full
  17. Indiecator
  18. Many Welps
  19. Chasing Dings!
  20. Casual Catte Creations
  21. Tales of the Aggronaut
  22. Nerd Girl Thoughts

  32. A Nerdy Fujo Cries

  37. Taxodium

  39. Musings and Mumblings
  40. leekscosycorner

  42. Mailvaltar

  45. notes / druchan
  46. afsheen.me

  48. Nerdy Bookahs
  49. EVE Online Pictures
  50. Musings on seeking
  51. ねじまきブログ
  52. NickSimson.com

So it is, off we go, another year, onward ho!
